quick_delivery: Plate offers quick delivery of organic & healthy food all over the state.
food_delivery_service: Our food delivery service is available in more than 200 cities for your comfort.
best_tastiest_food: Plate regularly updates the menus to make sure our customers eat the best and the tastiest food.
client_reviews: Our clients’ reviews are the best way to learn more about our food delivery service.
plate_established: Plate was established in 2013, as a reliable food service provider where anyone could order healthy food they like.
gluten_free: Choose gluten-free meals from our menu
fresh_ingredients: The freshest ingredients for every dish
great_discounts: Get great discounts when ordering for 2+ people
detox_description: The best choice if you are looking for tasty & light yet healthy food to start your day full of energy.
balanced_description: If you need daily balanced menu including breakfast & dinner, then Balanced package is what you need!
vegan_description: Special menu developed for our vegan clients who appreciate healthy and plant-based food.
choose_package: First, select the package that you prefer the most.
customize_menu_desc: After that, feel free to change and customize your menu.
delivery_address_desc: Finally, let us know where and when to deliver your food.
quality_desc: We work with the best suppliers to make sure you get the top-quality dishes, beverages, and service.
organic_desc: All ingredients we use are 100% organic and fresh. Such approach makes our food a lot healthier.
tasty_desc: Great and unforgettable taste of our dishes is what attracts more and more clients to Plate
diverse_desc: Our team regularly updates the menus to provide you with better food diversity whenever you order.
sophie_smith_review: I have tried a lot of food delivery services but Plate is something out of this world! Their food is really healthy and it tastes great, which is why I recommend this company to all my friends!
ann_peters_review: Both the food and your customer service are excellent in every way, and I just wanted to express how happy I am with your company. Wishing you all the best!
peter_lee_review: Thank you so much for your Balanced menu, it has been such a big help to me and I feel the food I am eating from you has really helped boost my immune system.
name: Name
